title: Song Seung-min
text:
Song Seung-min (; born 11 January 1992) is a South Korean <a href="Association%20football">footballer</a> who plays as <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29%23Striker">striker</a> for <a href="Pohang%20Steelers">Pohang Steelers</a>.
Career.
He was selected by <a href="Gwangju%20FC">Gwangju FC</a> in the <a href="2014%20K%20League%20Challenge">2014 K League</a> draft.
